hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Magic Meter# and #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Having trouble breathing underwater?^Have you tried wearing more BLUE?

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #an Odd Mushroom#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?
